comments: Brunson (DAL) is retreating alongside Nowell's (MIN) path and marginal contact occurs with Nowell's front and side during the drive.

Bullock's (DAL) right arm comes down slightly and marginal contact occurs with Nowell's (MIN) left arm during the driving shot attempt. Simultaneously, Brunson (DAL) jumps alongside Nowell's path and marginal contact occurs with Nowell's side.
Bullock's (DAL) right arm comes down slightly and marginal contact occurs with Nowell's (MIN) arm as Brunson (DAL) makes simultaneous clean contact with the ball.
Nowell (MIN) initiates contact with Brunson's (DAL) back and left shoulder after he retrieves the rebound.
Brunson (DAL) is already in Edwards' (MIN) path when contact occurs and he does not deliver contact following the hand-off.
Beasley (MIN) is the last player to touch the ball before the ball goes out of bounds.  Possession is correctly awarded to Dallas.
Edwards (MIN) brings his right hand forward and marginal contact occurs with Doncic's (DAL) left arm as Doncic crosses over on the wing.
Doncic (DAL) brings his off-arm toward Edwards' (MIN) front and marginal contact occurs as Doncic releases away beyond the perimeter.
Edwards (MIN) brings his left arm toward Doncic's (DAL) path and marginal contact occurs with Doncic's front as he starts his dribble.
Doncic (DAL) briefly grasps Edwards' (MIN) left arm and marginal contact occurs as Doncic immediately releases Edwards' arm.
Russell (MIN) slightly extends outward toward Kleber (DAL) and some contact occurs to Kleber's upper half, which he is able to move through to continue moving along the perimeter.
Towns (MIN) hooks his off-arm around Kleber's (DAL) upper half and initiates contact that affects Kleber's ability to defend as Towns starts his drive.
Doncic (DAL) attempts to establish himself outside the RA in Towns' (MIN) path and Towns is able to slip the marginal body contact to finish at the rim during the dunk attempt.
Towns (MIN) and Kleber (DAL) briefly engage and disengage off ball.
Kleber (DAL) is already in Towns' (MIN) path when contact occurs and he gives Towns the time and distance to avoid the contact.
Russell (MIN) and Dinwiddie (DAL) briefly engage and disengage off ball.
Dinwiddie (DAL) extends his left arm forward and initiates contact with Russell's (MIN) right arm as Russell rips through.
Finney-Smith (DAL) is firming up over his right leg when he absorbs the contact from Beverley (MIN) to his upper body. Beverley's reaction is not commensurate with the level of contact.
Russell (MIN) is returning his foot to the floor and does not intentionally kick the ball as Doncic (DAL) crosses over on the perimeter.
Doncic (DAL) legally goes into the backcourt to retrieve the loose ball after it touches Russell (MIN).
Correctly called 24 second violation on Dallas. The game clock was re-set to 0:10.3.
Towns (MIN) and Dinwiddie (DAL) engage and disengage with one another prior to the release of the inbound pass.
Beverley (MIN) is already in Bullock's (DAL) path and does not deliver the contact as the defensive switch occurs during the screen.
Dinwiddie (DAL) makes clean contact with the ball and dislodges it away from Towns (MIN) prior to incidental contact occurring with Towns' front.
Bullock (DAL) commits a take foul on Beverley (MIN). The contact occurs prior to the start of Beverley's upward shooting motion.
The ball makes contact with the rim prior to Beverley (MIN) crossing the threshold of the free throw line.

Replay review of the foul called on Doncic (DAL) pursuant to a coach's challenge was deemed successful. Doncic establishes a legal guarding position and absorbs the marginal body contact initiated by Beverley (MIN) during his upward shooting motion. Doncic avoids making contact with Beverley's arm as he swipes forward.
Doncic (DAL) commits a take foul on Beverley (MIN).
Correctly called delay of game warning against Minnesota.

Beverley (MIN) pump fakes his second free throw before releasing his shot attempt, which causes multiple players to step into the lane. A free throw violation should have been called with possession awarded to Dallas.
Kleber (DAL) and Towns (MIN) engage and disengage with one another during rebounding.
Towns (MIN) releases the shot attempt prior to his right foot landing out of bounds.
